snippet: Grace Garcia, 59, executive director of the Democratic fund-raising group Annie’s List and a former aide to Bill and Hillary Clinton, was killed in a crash near Dallas, colleagues said Tuesday.
abstract: Grace Garcia, executive director of the Democratic fund-raising group Annie’s List and a former aide to Bill and Hillary Rodham Clinton, is killed in a crash near Dallas.
lead_paragraph: Grace Garcia, 59, executive director of the Democratic fund-raising group Annie’s List and a former aide to Bill and Hillary Clinton, was killed in a crash near Dallas, colleagues said Tuesday.

headline.main: Texas: Prominent Fund-Raiser Dies in Crash
headline.print_headline: Texas: Prominent Fund-Raiser Dies in Crash
